    • Method Detail

      • addConversation

        public void addConversation​(java.net.InetAddress a,
                            ConversationFrame b)
        Method to bind an IP Address to a conversation frame which is added into a HashMap. This HasMap contains the actual list of all the opened conversations.
        Parameters:
        inetAdd - IP Address of the distant user that you want to contact.
        convFram - The conversation frame with the said distant user.

      • removeConversation

        public void removeConversation​(java.net.InetAddress add)
        Method to remove a conversation from the HashMap which contained the active conversation frame.
        Parameters:
        add - IP Address of the distant user that will be removed.

      • isConversation

        public boolean isConversation​(java.net.InetAddress add)
        Method to check if a conversation frame is currently open.
        Parameters:
        add - IP Address of the distant user that you want to check.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if the IP Address is already in the HashMap else False.

      • createConv

        public void createConv​(java.net.InetAddress inetAdd)
        Method to create a frame conversation with a distant user. Then the frame is added to the HashMap and binded to it's IP Address.
        Parameters:
        inetAdd - IP Address of the distant user.

      • getConvList

        public java.util.HashMap<java.net.InetAddress,​ConversationFrame> getConvList()
        Method which return the HashMap that contain the link between an address and a frame.
        Returns:
        HashMap HashMap that contain the link between an address and a frame.

      • msgReceived

        public void msgReceived​(java.lang.String message_received,
                        java.net.InetAddress inetAdr_sources)
        This method append a message to a frame conversation when a message is received. Then the frame is added to the HashMap and binded to it's IP Address.
        Parameters:
        message_received - The message received.
        inetAdr_sources - IP Address of the distant user.

      • addUser

        public void addUser​(java.lang.String name,
                    java.net.InetAddress adr)
        Add a given user into the local UserList.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the user you want to add into the UserList.
        adr - The IP address of the user you want to add into the UserList. of the destination rectangle in pixels
        See Also:
        InetAddress

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser​(java.lang.String name)
        Remove a given user from the local UserList.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the user you want to add into the UserList.

      • updateUL

        public void updateUL​(UserList uList)
        Update the UserList with the given one and update the main view with the new UserList.
        Parameters:
        uList - The new UserList you want to be used.

      • startApplication

        public void startApplication()
        Start the main application (main view) after you get logged.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect yourself from the application.

      • getNetworkController

        public NetworkController getNetworkController()
        Return this local NetworkController.
        Returns:
        The local NetworkController.
        See Also:
        NetworkController

      • isPseudoValid

        public boolean isPseudoValid​(java.lang.String pseudo)
        Check if this pseudo is already taken by someone else using the application.
        Parameters:
        pseudo - Pseudo you want to check.
